title: [FEATURE] TIFF support
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

Issue #433 was closed in 2018 for Skia not supporting TIFF. This doesn't seem the case anymore: https://github.com/google/skia/blob/320dccf1a32dbc4d477fdb194515f75731903a6a/src/codec/SkTiffUtility.h

### Describe the solution you would like

Port of TIFF support

### Describe alternatives you have considered

see original issue

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [X] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct

comments.author: Tampa
comments.body:
Reading through that issue and the solutions it doesn't seem that complicated to add support either. The only problematic part, having worked with tiff in System.Drawing, is that tiff supports a wide variety of pixel formats so it might take some effort to get full support for all of those.

However, that's also why this would be a great addition as the ability to store a lot of higher bitrate formats is useful for applications that require that sort of bit depth.
